description.french: Tu as vaincu l'Esclavagiste Archon
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Arconte schiavista
description.spanish: Has derrotado al Esclavista Arconte.

description.french: Tu as vaincu les quatre Chevaliers Archon
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i quattro Cavalieri Arconti
description.spanish: Has derrotado a los cuatro Caballeros Arcontes.
description.schinese: 已击败四个执政官骑士
description.japanese: アルコンの騎士4体を撃破した

description.french: Tu as vaincu les Rassembleurs Transcendés
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i Sommi Congregatori
description.spanish: Has derrotado a los Congregados de los Alzados.
description.japanese: アライゾン群衆僧を撃破した

description.french: Tu as vaincu l'Artillerie
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Artiglieria
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la artillería.
description.japanese: 砲兵を撃破した

description.french: Tu as vaincu la Bête céleste
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Bestia celestiale
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la bestia celestial.
description.japanese: 天上の獣を撃破した

description.french: Tu as vaincu le Dévoreur
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Consumatore
description.spanish: Has derrotado al consumidor.
description.japanese: コンシューマーを撃破した

description.english: Kept your data and defeated The Interface
description.french: Tu as conservés tes données et tu as vaincu l'Interface
description.italian: Hai mantenuto i dati e sconfitto l'Interfaccia
description.spanish: Has conservado tus datos y derrotado a la interfaz.
description.schinese: 已保留你的数据，并且击败了结界兽
description.russian: Вы оставили данные себе и победили Интерфейс
description.japanese: データを保持しインターフェイスを撃破した
description.portuguese: Manteve Seus Dados e Derrotou a Interface
description.hungarian: Megőrizted az adataidat, és legyőzted az Interfészt.

description.english: Answered the challenge of Undisturbed Defas Nemundis
description.german: Herausforderung von Defas Nemundis dem Ruhenden angenommen
description.french: Tu as accepté le défi de Defas Nemundis l'Impassible
description.italian: Hai accettato la sfida di Defas Nemundis, l'Impassibile
description.koreana: 동요하지 않는 자, 네문디스의 도전을 받아들였다
description.spanish: Has aceptado el desafío de Defas Nemundis, el Impertérrito.
description.schinese: 已接受沉寂之神德法斯·尼蒙迪斯的挑战
description.japanese: 邪魔されぬ者、デファス・ネムンディスの挑戦を受け入れた
description.portuguese: Aceitou o Desafio de Defas Nemundis, o Inalterável
description.hungarian: Elfogadtad Defas Nemundis, a Háborítatlan kihívását.

description.english: Answered the challenge of Ozyormy Goija, the Master of Puppets
description.german: Herausforderung von Ozyormy Goija dem Puppenspieler angenommen
description.french: Tu as accepté le défi d'Ozyormy Goija le Maître des pantins
description.italian: Hai accettato la sfida di Ozyormy Goija, il Signore dei fantocci
description.koreana: 꼭두각시의 주인, 오지로미 고이자의 도전을 받아들였다
description.spanish: Has aceptado el desafío de Ozyormy Goija, Maestro de los Títeres.
description.schinese: 已接受傀儡大师奥兹约米·歌亚的挑战
description.russian: Вызов Озиорми Гойи, Властелина кукол, принят
description.japanese: パペットマスター、オジオルミー・ゴヤの挑戦を受け入れた
description.portuguese: Aceitou o Desafio de Ozyormy Goija, o Mestre dos Fantoches
description.hungarian: Elfogadtad Ozyormy Goija, a bábmester kihívását.

description.french: Tu as vaincu le Sentient
description.italian: Hai annientato il Senziente
description.spanish: Has derrotado al sintiente.
description.japanese: 歩哨を打ち負かした

description.french: Tu as vaincu l'Hôtesse prédatrice
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la nostra Valletta predatrice
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Nuestra Huésped de la Depredación.
description.schinese: 已击败我们的掠夺女主人
description.japanese: 獲物狩るホステスを撃破した

description.french: Tu as vaincu le Transporteur
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Trasportatore
description.spanish: Has derrotado al transportador.
description.japanese: 運び屋を撃破した

description.english: Answered the challenge of Uthos, the Ashen Born
description.german: Herausforderung von Uthos dem Aschegeborenen angenommen
description.french: Tu as accepté le défi d'Uthos né des cendres
description.italian: Hai accettato la sfida di Uthos, colui che è nato dalla cenere
description.spanish: Has aceptado el desafío de Uthos, hijo de la ceniza.
description.schinese: 已接受灰烬重生者乌托斯的挑战
description.japanese: 灰より出ずるユーソスの挑戦を受け入れた
description.portuguese: Aceitou o desafio de Uthos, o Nascido-das-Cinzas

description.english: Did as asked and ended it peacefully
description.german: Du hast getan, was dir gesagt wurde, und hast es friedlich beendet
description.french: Tu as obéi aux directives et tu en as terminé pacifiquement
description.italian: Hai fatto come ti è stato detto e tutto è finito in maniera pacifica
description.spanish: Has hecho lo que se te ha ordenado y todo ha terminado en paz.
description.schinese: 已遵照命令，平安结束了任务
description.russian: Вы выполнили все указания и достигли мирного конца
description.japanese: 指示された通りに行動し、平和に終わらせた
description.portuguese: Fez o que mandaram e terminou pacificamente
description.hungarian: Azt tetted, amire utasítottak, és békésen vetettem véget neki.

description.english: Found and input one of the Five Eyes codes
description.german: Einen der Fünf-Augen-Codes gefunden und eingegeben
description.french: Tu as trouvé et saisi l'un des codes des Cinq Yeux
description.italian: Hai trovato e digitato uno dei codici dei Cinque occhi
description.koreana: 다섯 눈의 암호 중 하나를 발견해 입력했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado y usado uno de los códigos de los cinco ojos.
description.schinese: 已找到并输入五眼密码之一
description.russian: Вы нашли один из кодов Пяти Глаз и воспользовались им
description.japanese: ファイブ・アイズのコードの 1 つを発見し入力した
description.portuguese: Encontrou e inseriu um dos códigos dos Cinco Olhos
description.hungarian: Megtaláltad, és beírtad az öt szem egyik kódját.

description.french: Le Spawn prodigue a été détruite
description.italian: Hai distrutto la Progenie prodiga
description.spanish: Has destruido a la Prole Pródiga
description.japanese: 放蕩スポーンを破壊した

displayName.french: Je suis rempli de mauvaises idées !

description.english: Helped the Architect repaired the Interface
description.german: Dem Architekten bei der Reparatur des Interfaces geholfen
description.french: Tu as aidé l'Architecte à réparer l'Interface
description.italian: Hai aiutato l'Architetto a riparare l'Interfaccia
description.spanish: Has ayudado al arquitecto a reparar la interfaz.
description.schinese: 已帮助建筑师修复结界兽
description.japanese: インターフェイスを修理するアーキテクトを手伝った
description.portuguese: Ajudou o Arquiteto a consertar a Interface
description.hungarian: Segítettél az építésznek megjavítani az Interfészt.

description.french: Tu as aidé le Vieil Homme
description.italian: Hai aiutato il vecchio
description.spanish: Has ayudado al viejo.
description.japanese: 老人を助けた

description.english: Repaired the EVA suit and went for a walk outside Irid Novo
description.german: Außenbordanzug repariert und Spaziergang außerhalb von Irid Novo gemacht
description.french: Tu as réparé la combinaison de sortie extravéhiculaire et tu es allé te balader en dehors d'Irid Novo
description.italian: Hai riparato una tuta EVA e passeggiato all'esterno di Irid Novo
description.koreana: EVA 슈트를 수리하고 이리드 노보의 바깥을 걸었다
description.spanish: Has reparado el traje EVA y te has dado un paseo por los exteriores de Irid Novo.
description.schinese: 已修复舱外套装，到新彩虹眼外面散了步
description.russian: Вы починили скафандр и вышли на прогулку за пределы Ирид Ново
description.japanese: 船外活動服を修理してイリド・ノヴォの外を歩いた
description.portuguese: Consertou o traje EVA e partiu para um passeio fora de Irid Novo
description.hungarian: Megjavítottad az EVA-ruhát, és elmentél sétálni Irid Novon kívül.

description.english: Turned off the lights, from the start to the end
description.german: Lichter ausgeschaltet, von Anfang bis Ende
description.french: Tu as éteint les lumières, du début à la fin
description.italian: Hai spento le luci, dall'inizio alla fine
description.spanish: Has tenido las luces apagadas de principio a fin.
description.russian: Вы выключили свет, от начала и до конца
description.japanese: 最初から最後まで明かりを消した
description.portuguese: Apagou as luzes, do começo ao fim
description.hungarian: Az elejétől a végéig lekapcsoltad a világítást.

description.french: Tu as trouvé 66 pièces
description.italian: Hai trovato 66 monete
description.spanish: Has encontrado 66 monedas.
description.japanese: コインを 66 枚発見した

displayName.spanish: A ver qué tienes para mí
displayName.japanese: お前の力を見せてみろ
displayName.portuguese: Mostra aí o que você tem

description.french: Tu as parlé à une divinité cosmique
description.italian: Hai parlato con un dio cosmico
description.spanish: Has hablado con un dios cósmico.

description.english: Found a monolith and explored the Underworld

description.japanese: アップグレードチップをソケットに差し込んだ

description.english: Reached a more challenging parallel universe

description.portuguese: Chegou a um universo paralelo mais desafiador

description.english: Opened the Observatory's Iris, and gazed in Sagittarius' depth

description.spanish: Has abierto el Iris del observatorio y contemplado las profundidades de Sagitario.
description.schinese: 已打开天文台虹膜，凝视了射手座的深处
description.russian: Вы открыли Зрачок Обсерватории и заглянули в глубины Стрельца

description.hungarian: Megnyitottad az Obszervatórium íriszét, és beletekintettél a Nyilas mélyébe.
